basic_information.scholarship_name: Bernard & Lucille Hall Family Endowed Scholarship

description: The Bernard & Lucille Hall Family Endowed Scholarship is open to declared PGA Golf Management majors with a minimum 2.25 cumulative GPA. Eligibility Requirements Declared PGA Management major Students must have completed at least one internship within the PGM program Must be a U.S. citizen Minimum 2.25 cumulative GPA Selection Process Financial need to be considered, but not preferred One faculty recommendation letter is required (Please indicate the College of Business faculty member on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation)

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
